parameter.name: N
parameter.comment: number of aircraft in the system

assumption.comment: there are at least 2 aircraft in the system, but no more than 10
z3 cannot handle integer + real arithmetic, so we must use a real-valued copy of N that has the same value; alternatively, we could just fix beta to be some value satisfying this constraint

initial.equn: (forall i j ( ((i != j) implies (x[i] - x[j] >= rs)) and x[i] >= 0.0 and x[j] >= 0.0 and t[i] == 0.0 and t[j] == 0.0 and left[i] == 0 and right[i] == 0 and right[j] == 0 and left[j] == 0)) and leftmost == 0 and rightmost == 0

action.equn: t[i]' = 0.0 and ((exists nl nr (forall l r ( ((nl != r and nr != l and i != l and i != r and x[nl] >= x[l] and x[nl] < x[i] and x[l] < x[i] and x[nr] <= x[r] and x[nr] > x[i] and x[r] > x[i]) implies (left[i]' = nl and right[i]' = nr))) )))

guard.equn: left[i] == 0 and right[i] == 0 and (forall r ((i != r) implies (x[i] < x[r])))

action.equn: t[i]' = 0.0 and (exists nr (forall r ((i != nr and i != r) implies (x[i] <= x[nr] and x[nr] <= x[r] and left[i]' = 0 and right[i]' = nr and rightmost' == i) )))

guard.equn: left[i] == 0 and right[i] == 0 and (forall l ((i != l) implies (x[i] > x[l])))

action.equn: t[i]' = 0.0 and (exists nl (forall l ((i != nl and i != l) implies (x[i] >= x[nl] and x[nl] >= x[l] and left[i]' = nl and right[i]' = 0 and leftmost' == i) )))

guard.equn: t[i] >= Ts and (left[i] != 0 implies ((x[i] - x[ left[i] ] - 2.0 * Ts * vmax) > rs))
t[i] >= Ts and (right[i] != 0 implies ((x[ right[i] ] - x[ i ] + 2.0 * Ts * vmax) >= rs))
t[i] >= Ts and (left[i] != 0 implies ((x[i] - x[ left[i] ] - 2.0 * Ts * vmax) < rs))
t[i] >= Ts and (right[i] != 0 implies ((x[ right[i] ] - x[ i ] + 2.0 * Ts * vmax) < rs))

property.equn: forall i ((q[i] != Initial) implies (left[i] != 0 or right[i] != 0))
property.comment: once agents leave initial, they have either a left or right

property.equn: forall i ((q[i] != Initial) implies (left[i] != 0 and right[i] != 0))
property.comment: once agents leave initial, they have either a left or right

property.equn: forall i ((q[i] != Initial) implies (exists j (leftmost == j)))
property.comment: there is an agent with the lowest position

property.equn: forall i ((q[i] != Initial) implies (exists j (rightmost == j)))
property.comment: there is an agent with the lowest position

property.equn: exists j (forall i ((i != j) implies (x[j] < x[i] )))
property.comment: there is an agent with the lowest position

property.equn: exists j (forall i ((i != j) implies (x[i] < x[j] )))
property.comment: there is an agent with the highest position
